feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two sermon-related frontend features, their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files covering styling, settings, location search, APIs, tabs, and feature sections.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata, Inter font loading, and root div for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering header and mobile tab navigation with six feature tabs.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Empty file placeholder for authentication button component.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Mobile-oriented tab navigation component defining six tabs and rendering their content.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Prompt card shown when no location is selected, guiding the user to location setup.

frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching, selecting, and saving a user location using geocoding results and app settings.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Fetches geocoding results from Open-Meteo and converts results into internal Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Location and GeocodingResult used in the location features.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that performs debounced geocoding searches against the Open-Meteo API.

frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Handles loading, migrating, and saving settings to localStorage with versioned schema management.

frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: Manages app settings via React Query, loading from and saving to local storage with defaults.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather data from Open-Meteo and maps weather codes to descriptions.

frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color theme with light/dark variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and includes typography, container‑queries, and animate plugins.
